content:
I have three PRs related to UI experiments that I hope we can test-deploy here (czo).

  • #20949 (buddy list circles)
  • #20961 (remove blue box) or #20945 (thinner blue box)

Let me know if there is anything I need to do to make these ready for czo. (I assume the only blocker is competing priorities.)

The following will go away if we try out #20949:

image.png
